actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 to carry out the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964.

summary.text: Amends the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964 to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 to carry out the purposes of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1978, 1979, and 1980 to carry out the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act of 1964.
